ROW.DATDSC: select * from ( select distinct a.reference, a.senderinstid, a.recverinstid, a.businesscode, b.name, b.percent||'%' percent, b.percentnote, b.crtdat from si_msgtextlog a, runostimer b where a.reference = b.id and a.reference = '[%ref]' )a order by a.reference,a.crtdat desc,a.percent desc
